data.eml:eml: Fragilaria rinoi sp. nov. (Fragilariales, Fragilariophyceae) from periphytic river samples in Central Portugal

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Cristina Delgado, M. Helena Novais, Saúl Blanco, Salomé F. P. Almeida (2016): Fragilaria rinoi sp. nov. (Fragilariales, Fragilariophyceae) from periphytic river samples in Central Portugal. European Journal of Taxonomy 248: 1-16, DOI: 10.5852/ejt.2016.248
